howItWorks.title: AI powered legal technology that accelerates your entire firm

features.title: Hearings
points: Get notification of your court items such as case number, item & room number on the go in just a click.

features.title: Judgements
points: Gain instant access to over 5 million+ judgments by searching keywords, citations, headings, party names, or judge names, enabling quick and efficient retrieval of relevant judgments.

features.title: Display Board
points: Keep track of your daily item numbers with our real-time display board.

features.title: Case Alerts
points: Elevate your legal strategy with real-time case updates from the largest case directory in India, empowering you to stay ahead in the game.

features.title: User-Friendly Interface
features.desc: Simplify your schedule and stay organised with real-time updates on the display board, hearings, appointments, tasks, quick access to the calendar, easy navigation to the menu, and much more.

features.title: Stay Updated on Your Legal Cases
features.desc: Simplify case management by adding all of your cases from The Supreme Court of India, High Courts, District Courts, and Tribunals, combined on a single platform, under your Vakalat name or barcode.

features.title: Unlock the power of efficient legal research with our groundbreaking solution
features.desc: Expand your legal expertise with in-depth knowledge of Indian laws, acts, access to over 10,000+ court formats and work flow of courts across India.

features.title: Seamless Access to Legal Documents
features.desc: Enjoy a document vault with 10GB cloud storage, ensuring safe storage of case documents without the hassle of carrying them.

features.title: Efficient Property Due-Diligence with Automation
features.desc: Expedite your property due-diligence with automated procedures, generating reports within minutes.
